thread.title: Murdered Mexican Journalist Exposed Cartel-Government Connection
thread.title_full: Murdered Mexican Journalist Exposed Cartel-Government Connection

author: Ildefonso Ortiz
title: Murdered Mexican Journalist Exposed Cartel-Government Connection
text: The murder of a respected journalist in the Mexican state of Chihuahua appears to be driven by her work exposing the close ties between government officials and the Juarez Cartel. One of those investigations pointed to the mother-in-law of a cartel boss trying to run for mayor, while others looked into how the former governor of that state protected certain criminal organizations.
